-----------------------------------------------
This app allows you to use your phone to act as a USB keyboard and mouse without requiring any software on the connected device, allowing it to even work in the BIOS/UEFI of the connected device!
How do I use the app?

> Directly use your phone as a touchpad by interacting with the "Touchpad". 

 > Directly use your phone as a keyboard using "Direct Input" 

 > Send text (inject keystroke) using "Manual Input" with "Send" button. 

 > Directly execute scripts using "Manual Input" with "Execute" button below "Manual Input". 

 > Save script in "Manual Input" to script file with "Save" button 

 > Select and execute plain text script file of (.ahc, .duck, .txt) extensions using buttons below "Script File Path". 

 > Load the script within a selected script file onto "Manual Input" with the "Edit" button.
Click on the keyboard icon in the top menu bar. Your keyboard should be pulled up. Now just start typing and the keys will be relayed to the connected device in real-time.

Type into the "Manual Input" textbox and click the "send" button when you're done, at which point the text will be typed into the connected device all at once. 

To allow input of special characters, and modifier keys via this method ' {[X]} ' tag format can be used as follows:


 ---------------------------------------- 
 MODIFIER KEYS 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 {[C]} for Ctrl 
 {[A]} for Alt 
 {[S]} for Shift 
 {[M]} for Meta/Windows key


 ---------------------------------------- 
 SPECIAL KEYS 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 {[E]} for Escape 
 {[T]} for Tab 
 {[B]} for Backspace 
 {[N]} for Enter 
 {[U]} for Up 
 {[D]} for Down 
 {[R]} for Right 
 {[L]} for Left 
 {[1]} for F1 
 {[2]} for F2 
 {[3]} for F3 
 {[4]} for F4 
 {[5]} for F5 
 {[6]} for F6 
 {[7]} for F7 
 {[8]} for F8 
 {[9]} for F9 
 {[!]} for F10 
 {[@]} for F11 
 {[#]} for F12


 ---------------------------------------- 
 COMMANDS 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 {[ ]} to sleep for 500ms (space)


 ---------------------------------------- 
 Examples: 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 to send "hello": 
 hello 
 open notepad in windows: 
 {[M]}r{[ ]}{[ ]}notepad{[N]}


Do note that a new line in the manual input is also processed as ENTER in addition to {[N]}. For a more readable solution use scripting format with the "Execute" button below Manual Input.

The following commands and keys can be used for scripting. Some commands and keys will have multiple variations for same function or key and are separated by ' , ' (comma). 
Do note that only COMMANDS will take a parameter. MODIFIER KEYS and SPECIAL KEYS will not take any parameter.


 ---------------------------------------- 
 COMMANDS: 
 ----------------------------------------


 //, REM -> comments 

 NAME -> name of script - treated as comment 

 DESC -> description of script - treated as comment 

 AUTHOR -> author of script - treated as comment 

 SEND, STRING -> sends the string passed, (Manual input "Send") 

 SENDLN, STRINGLN -> sends the string passed followed by ENTER, (Manual input "Send") 

 SLEEP, DELAY -> temporarily cease execution of script for the specified number of milliseconds


 ---------------------------------------- 
 MODIFIER KEYS: 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 L_CTRL, L_CONTROL, CTRL 
 L_ALT, ALT 
 L_SHIFT, SHIFT 
 L_META, L_WIN, META, WIN 
 R_CTRL, R_CONTROL 
 R_ALT 
 R_SHIFT 
 R_META, R_WIN


 ---------------------------------------- 
 SPECIAL KEYS: 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 UP 
 DOWN 
 LEFT 
 RIGHT 
 ESCAPE, ESC 
 TAB 
 BACKSPACE, BACK 
 DELETE, DEL 
 PRINT 
 SPACE 
 ENTER 
 SCROLL_LOCK 
 NUM_LOCK 
 PAUSE 
 INSERT 
 HOME 
 END 
 PAGE_UP, PG_UP 
 PAGE_DOWN, PG_DOWN 
 NEXT 
 PREVIOUS, PREV 
 PLAY_PAUSE, PLAY, PP 
 VOLUME_UP, VOL_UP 
 VOLUME_DOWN, VOL_DOWN 
 F1 
 F2 
 F3 
 F4 
 F5 
 F6 
 F7 
 F8 
 F9 
 F10 
 F11 
 F12


 ---------------------------------------- 
 Example Script: 
 ---------------------------------------- 
 // Script To open notepad in windows: 
 WIN 
 SEND r 
 DELAY 1000 
 SEND notepad 
 ENTER 
 ----------------------------------------
How do I report bugs or submit feature requests?
You can create an issue here. Just make sure it hasn\'t already been reported.
The app isn\'t working properly, how do I fix it?
First, make sure your device satisfies all prerequisites listed here and read the above answer about how to use the app. If that doesn\'t work, I recommend submitting a bug report as explained above.

Any mention of \"Direct Input\" refers to the keyboard icon in the menu bar that can be selected to pull up your keyboard and relay your keystrokes in real-time.\n\nAny mention \"Manual Input\" refers to the textbox that you can put text into and have it send all at once when you click the button beside it.
